response.original_title: Blind Guardian: [2015] Live at Minneapolis - Beyond the Red Mirror Tour
response.overview: The Ninth Wave, Banish from Sanctuary, Nightfall, Fly, Tanelorn (Into the Void), Prophecies, The Last Candle, Lord of the Rings, Time Stands Still (at the Iron Hill), Bright Eyes, And the Story Ends, Sacred Worlds, Twilight of the Gods, Valhalla, I'm Alive, The Bard's Song - In the Forest, Mirror Mirror
response.title: Blind Guardian: [2015] Live at Minneapolis - Beyond the Red Mirror Tour
